Welcome

I’m a designer based in Vancouver, Canada. I currently work as a UX Designer at Jostle. Please enjoy this small catalog of projects I worked on between 2012 and 2014.

Map of the Internet

UI/UX, iOS, Android, Visual Design

Map of the Internet is exactly as it sounds. It’s a map of the internet!

View project

Devmonitor.io

UX/UI, Visual Design, Front-end

A web app for ‘devangelists’ to track questions from Stackoverflow.

View project

ECUAD Catalog Platform

UI/UX, System Design, Front-end, iPad

A scalable system to help curators approve and share hundreds projects.

View project

Inspiral Magazine

UX/UI, Responsive, WordPress

A publishing system designed to take on a life of its own.

View project

Know Ideas

Book Design, Print Production

130 pages of paper that helps people understand Internet culture.

View project

Making Conversation

Podcast, Indentity, Community

A podcast featuring conversations with artists and designers.

View project

Woo To See You Identity

Identity & Branding

Making sure it feels good to say, “Woo To See You”.

View project
